scripts.mobile:init: npm install && npm run build && npx cap add android && npx cap add ios
scripts.mobile:update: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.generate:android: npm run build && npx cap add android
scripts.generate:ios: npm run build && npx cap add ios
scripts.sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.build:apk: npm run sync && echo 'Opening Android Studio... Go to Build -> Build Bundle(s) / APK(s) -> Build APK(s)' && npx cap open android
